description: Art Around Us is an informational book that teaches readers about different kinds of artists and the varied and sometimes unusual art they create. Painters, sculptors, potters, glassblowers, and fiber artists are highlighted. Photographs and captions support the text. Book and lesson also available at Levels M and P.
